underlying_goal: Implement the plan to make tmux-cli the standard for running experiments by updating documentation and the `/run-experiment` skill.
primary_success: Successfully implemented the plan to update project documentation (CLAUDE.md) and the `/run-experiment` skill, establishing tmux-cli as the persistent experiment execution standard.
brief_summary: Following a pre-defined plan, Claude updated the global CLAUDE.md to prioritize tmux-cli for running experiments due to its persistence. The `/run-experiment` skill was also refactored to use tmux-cli instead of `run_in_background`. The changes were then committed and pushed.
